import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Table, Container, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Layout from "../Layout"; export default class ShowCart extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { cartItems: [], totalPrice: Number }; } componentDidMount() { let cartArray = []; let price = 0; cartArray = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("cartItem")) || []; console.log("cartArray is", cartArray); this.setState({ cartItems: cartArray }, () => { console.log("cartItem", this.state.cartItems); for (let i = 0; i <= this.state.cartItems.length; i++) { price = price + this.state.cartItems[i].price; console.log("price", this.state.cartItems[0].price); } }); } render() { return (

); } }
